text:
Easily accessible as there are bus stops in front.

Both children and adults will enjoy this place as learning and having fun has no age limit.

Learn to dance, skate and act are offered here. Also, you can have fun working out or climbing high walls. No worries if you get hungry, there's a place to eat, so far only one restaurant.

On all the services offered, I am only familiar with Threeesteps Dance Studio (yes, 3 E's) as my daughter is a student there. Her development in dancing can be clearly seen. The teacher is very good and the teaching process does work.

I also saw kids and some adults try the wall climbing. The coaches were very helpful, the reason you can see that those that were trying it are enjoying.
Front desk was rude for 6pm slot. The vertical slide drop staff should direct kids how to slide and tuck in their shirt to prevent injuries. Apart from that, Indoor playground was nice and fun.

The place is not so popular and business  keep changing
"Bouncy Paradise ", as its said for changing sign boards of the building and its BUSSINESS.
Use to be a swimming pool before this building structure.
It was reported that the LHN group took over the management and since then new ventures keep taking place for our excitement
Great place to bring your kids for various interesting activities like rockclimbing, tennis, aikido and more. Environment is children centric with a nice affordable cafe for parents or elderly too
There are a number of different activity classes here for kids but the toilets are really horrendous. It's like no one cleaned it for years and it is extremely dirty and smelly.
